title: Cool Optical Illusions: Creative Activities
description:
Cool Optical Illusions: Creative Activities That Make Math & Science Fun for Kids! (Cool Art With Math & Science) by Elissa Mann

English | Aug. 1, 2013 | ISBN: 1617838225 | 34 Pages | PDF | 9 MB

Discover secret math and science tricks to creating art! This title introduces young readers to the sciences, with a creative twist. Math and science educational pages are interspersed with cool optical illusion activities that offer practical applications of the information students learn in class. All activities include how-to photos, easy instructions, and clear explanations
